ComicInfo.Summary:
Outnumbered and outgunned, the G.I. Joe field team hits the road with a captive and ranting Crystal Ball, but the Dreadnoks are hot on their heels! Meanwhile, Lady Jaye & Gung-Ho, with their cover blown, struggle to fight their way out of Athens. And a terrifying new threat rears its head in the Crown Jewel of the Hasbro Universe! From the explosive creative team of Aubrey Sitterson (Street Fighter x G.I. Joe) and Giannis Milonogiannis (Prophet).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 1 | Sub-A | Artist's Edition Subscription Cover A | Giannis Milonogiannis | 2 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | Robert Atkins (a) & Simon Gough (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ben Marra | 4 | Note: Includes a handbook entry for Helix.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 14:55:58. [CVDB592414]
